# MTLIOCommandQueueType.concurrent

**Case**

Sets a new input/output command queue’s type to a queue that runs commands concurrently.

## Declaration

```swift
case concurrent
```

## I/O command queue types

- **MTLIOCommandQueueType.serial**: Sets a new input/output command queue’s type to a queue that runs commands serially.

items.description: Sets a new input/output command queue’s type to a queue that runs commands serially.
items.name: MTLIOCommandQueueType.serial
